I saw this on HarvesteR\'s post and I was wondering if normal people could get it.

From this post: http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/index.php?topic=13530.msg226673#msg226673

On this image he has a orbit setter menu thing.

I was just wondering if there was any way to get something like this?
At the moment, the closest thing is editing your persistence file. Having it in-game would be a nice feature for sandbox mode.

That would be a development tool used to skip to certain parts of a game in order to test features. It is entirely up to Squad on whether to release it with the game. If it is released, it will probably be left up to the gamers to discover how to activate it. We are a wily bunch.
